successes.title: WAKFU: The Animated Series
successes.description: WAKFU is an epic fantasy-adventure series. Our goal is to produce a high-quality English dub to offer English broadcasters.

Pledges.description:
★The Yugo Pledge★ 
Physical Rewards: "Wakfu Backer" Sticker, Special thanks letter + Digital Reward: Your name on the "Thank You List" on the Wakfu website

★The Percedal Pledge★ Physical Rewards: "Wakfu Backer" Sticker, Official artwork poster + Digital Rewards: Digital fan package (PDF including the 1st character development sketches, 1st scenery background sketches and the musical partition of the theme song), Your name on the "Thank You List" on the Wakfu website

★The Amalia Pledge★
Physical Rewards: Artbook Wakfu 1 & 2 , Special Campaign Kickstarter T-Shirt, "Wakfu Backer" Sticker + Digital Reward: Your name on the "Thank You List" on the Wakfu website

★The Evangelyne Pledge★
Physical Rewards: One (1) Season One WAKFU Animated Series Blu-ray, "Wakfu Backer" sticker, Special campaign Kickstarter T-Shirt + Digital Rewards: Your name on the "Thank You List" on the Wakfu website, Digital fan package, PDF Artbook 1 & 2

★The Ruel Pledge★
Physical Rewards: One (1) Season One WAKFU Animated Series Blu-ray, Autographed illustrated official poster, "Wakfu Backer" sticker, Special campaign Kickskarter T-Shirt + Digital Rewards:  Digital fan package, PDF artbook 1 & 2, Exclusive redeemable WAKFU MMO Item, Your name on the "Thank You List" on the Wakfu website

★The Adamai Pledge★ Physical Rewards: One (1) Season One WAKFU Animated Series Blu-ray, Artbook Wakfu 1 & 2, Autographed Illustrated official poster, "Wakfu Backer" sticker, Special campaign Kickstarter T-Shirt + Digital Rewards: Digital fan pack, Exclusive redeemable WAKFU MMO Item + Your name on the "Thank You List" on the Wakfu website

★The EARLY BIRD SPECIAL - Alibert Pledge★
Physical Rewards: One (1) Season One WAKFU Animated Series Blu-ray, Artbook Wakfu 1 & 2, Illustration made by XA (Lead character designer) signed and numbered Giclee Print A3, "Wakfu Backer" sticker, Special campaign Kickskarter T-Shirt, Official illustrated poster + Digital Rewards: Exclusive redeemable WAKFU MMO Item, Digital fan pack, Your name on the "Thank You List" on the Wakfu website

★The Black Crow Pledge★
Physical Rewards: One (1) Season One WAKFU Animated Series on Blu-ray, Artbook Wakfu 1 & 2, WAKFU Kromaster figurine - Yugo VS Nox , Official illustrated poster, "Wakfu Backer" sticker, Special campaign Kickstarter T-Shirt + Digital Rewards: Digital fan pack, Exclusive redeemable WAKFU MMO Item, Soundtrack download, Your name on the "Thank You List" on the Wakfu website

★The Joris Pledge★
Physical Rewards: One (1) Season One WAKFU Animated Series on Blu-ray, Artbook Wakfu 1 & 2, WAKFU Kromaster figurine - Yugo VS Nox, Autographed illustrated official poster, "Wakfu Backer" sticker, Special campaign Kickstarter T-Shirt + Digital Rewards: Your name on the end credits of the episodes in the "Special Thanks", Digital fan pack, Exclusive redeemable WAKFU MMO Item, Soundtrack download, Your name on the "Thank You List" on the Wakfu website

★The Vampyro Pledge★
Physical Rewards: One (1) Season One WAKFU Animated Series on Blu-ray, Artbook 1,2,3&4, Autographed illustrated official poster, "Wakfu Backer" sticker + Special campaign Kickskarter T-Shirt + Digital rewards: Digital fan pack, Soundtrack download, Exclusive redeemable WAKFU MMO Item, Your name on the end credits of the episodes in the "Special Thanks", Your name on the "Thank You List" on the Wakfu website

★The EARLY BIRD SPECIAL - Grougal Pledge★
Physical Rewards: One (1) Season One WAKFU Animated Series on Blu-ray, Artbook 1 & 2, Autographed illustrated official poster, Figurine of Grougal (painted resin bust), "Wakfu Backer" sticker, Special campaign Kickskarter T-Shirt + Digital Rewards: Digital fan pack, Soundtrack download, Exclusive redeemable WAKFU MMO Item, Your name on the end credits of the episodes in the "Special Thanks", Your name on the "Thank You List" on the Wakfu website

★Xav The Baker Pledge★ Physical Rewards: One (1) Season One WAKFU Animated Series on Blu-ray, Artbook 1 & 2, Illustration made by XA (lead character designer) signed and numbered Giclee Print A3, Autographed illustrated official poster, "Wakfu Backer" sticker, Special campaign Kickskarter T-Shirt + Digital Rewards: Digital fan package, Your name on the end credits of the episodes in the "Special Thanks", Soundtrack download, Exclusive redeemable WAKFU MMO Item, Your name on the "Thank You List" on the Wakfu website

★The Qilby Pledge★ Physical Rewards: 9 artbooks w/collector box, Personalized autographed illustrated official poster, "Wakfu Backer" sticker + Digital Rewards: Digital fan package, Your name on the end credits of the episodes in the "Special Thanks", Soundtrack download, Exclusive redeemable WAKFU MMO Item, Your name on the "Thank You List" on the Wakfu website

★The Kriss la Krass Pledge★
Physical Rewards: One (1) Season One WAKFU Animated Series on Blu-ray, 9 artbooks w/collector box, WAKFU Kromaster figurine - Yugo VS Nox, Autographed official Illustration, XA signed and numbered Giclee Print A3, Autographed illustrated official poster, "Wakfu Backer" sticker, Special campaign Kickstarter T-Shirt + Digital Rewards: Digital fan package, Your name on the end credits of the episodes in the "Special Thanks", Soundtrack download, Exclusive redeemable WAKFU MMO Item, Your name on the "Thank You List" on the Wakfu website

★The Goultard Pledge★ Physical Rewards: One (1) Exclusive 28 cm / 11 inch Poly-resin Percidal figurine, One (1) Season One WAKFU Animated Series on Blu-ray, 9 artbooks w/collector box, WAKFU Kromaster figurine - Yugo VS Nox, Autographed official Illustration, XA signed and numbered Giclee Print A3, Autographed illustrated official poster A3, "Wakfu Backer" sticker, Special campaign Kickstarter T-Shirt + Digital Rewards: Digital fan package, Your name on the end credits of the episodes in the "Special Thanks", Soundtrack download, Exclusive redeemable WAKFU MMO Item, Your name on the "Thank You List" on the Wakfu website

★The Rushu Pledge★ Physical Rewards: 4 Exclusive A3 illustrated posters (each one signed by the artist)  , One (1) Season One WAKFU Animated Series on Blu-ray, 9 series artbooks w/collector box with each artbook signed by the production team (Character design, Background, Scenery, etc...), Personalized autographed illustrated official poster, "Wakfu Backer" sticker, Special campaign Kickstarter T-Shirt, WAKFU Kromaster figurine - Yugo VS Nox, XA signed and numbered Giclee Print A3 + Digital Rewards: Digital fan package, Your name on the end credits of the episodes in the "Special Thanks", Your name on the "Thank You List" on the Wakfu website

★The Razortime Pledge★
Physical Rewards: Possibility of dubbing a secondary character, One (1) Season One WAKFU Animated Series on Blu-ray, 9 series artbooks w/collector box with each artbook signed by the production team (Character design, Background, Scenery, etc...), Personalized autographed illustrated official poster, "Wakfu Backer" sticker, Special campaign Kickstarter T-Shirt, WAKFU Kromaster figurine - Yugo VS Nox, XA signed and numbered Giclee Print A3 + Digital Rewards: Digital fan package, Your name on the end credits of the episodes in the "Special Thanks", Your name on the "Thank You List" on the Wakfu website

★The Nox Pledge★
All rewards included in the Razortime Pledge + Trip to visit the studios + Breakfast with the author and creator + Illustration of yourself as a Wakfu character + Your name on the "Thank You List" on the Wakfu website
